title: Research Associate
description: Join a multidisciplinary team focused on pushing the boundaries of applied theoretical physics within a high-security laboratory environment. Responsibilities include formulating hypotheses, executing controlled studies, and contributing to long-range classified projects. Candidates must demonstrate discretion, analytical rigor, and a willingness to operate within restricted-access environments.
benefits: 30 required days of vacation for full-time staff

title: Systems Analyst
description: Work at the core of facility-wide systems integration to maintain operational integrity across secure labs. This position oversees telemetry synchronization, anomaly detection protocols, and real-time systems diagnostics. Applicants should have a strong background in systems architecture and the ability to troubleshoot under pressure in sensitive environments.
benefits: 30 required days of vacation for full-time staff

title: Containment Systems Engineer
description: Support the structural integrity of critical systems tied to ongoing classified experiments. This role involves high-level diagnostics, structural maintenance of sensitive hardware, and adherence to strict safety containment protocols. Prior experience with fail-safe systems and response procedures in high-risk settings is strongly recommended.
benefits: 30 required days of vacation for full-time staff

title: Security Officer
description: Ensure operational continuity through protection of personnel, infrastructure, and materials across multiple high-security zones. Tasks include escorting staff, enforcing clearance protocols, and responding to containment breach drills. Candidates with military, defense contracting, or federal security experience will be prioritized.
benefits: 30 required days of vacation for full-time staff

title: Sanitation Technician
description: Execute site-wide sanitation protocols in controlled research zones with heightened containment requirements. This role demands strict procedural adherence, adaptability in hazardous environments, and close collaboration with emergency response staff. Ideal for candidates with prior decon or industrial sanitation experience.
benefits: 30 required days of vacation for full-time staff
